alert.note: Alert for Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 11:28PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lamar County through MIDNIGHT CST... At 1128 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roxton, or 14 miles west of Paris, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Blossom, Roxton, Lake Crook, Powderly, Sumner, Lake Gibbons, Pattonville, Arthur City, Pat Mayse Lake, Camp Maxey, Forest Hill, Deport, Toco, Sun Valley, Glory, Midcity, Petty, Globe and Brookston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
